page.title: 10Leisure in NW Derby
page.content: 10% of our area is covered by two main parks: Markeaton Park and Darley Park. Each has ornamental areas, playgrounds, playing fields and rivers or lakes and each is extensively used for informal recreation. More formal facilities are available for sport, eg: bowls, tennis, squash, swimming, trampolining, gymnastics, hockey, badminton, netball, rugby, cricket, football, athletics, orient- eering, roller skating, weight lifting, rowing and canoeing. Derby City Council manages the two parks, other recreation grounds, the Lancaster Sports Centre, the City Recreation Centre, Queens St. and the Mundy Play Centre. Derby now holds a marathon, called the Ramathon, every year and part of the course lies through this area.
